message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's make it worthwhile for both of us.
Time is running out, let's meet in the middle!
Let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
You're losing value, I'm not. Take this before it gets worse!
This is my final offer. We both know time is on your side, but this is the best you'll get. Take it or leave it.
You said it yourself, time is on my side. You're running out of options!
